messages.subject: Re: No explanation needed
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/12/03 9:39:22 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/12/03 9:39:22 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
writes:

<< And like it has been said before I'm glad YOU got it, no explanation
needed,
but there are over a thousand people here. It's not wrong to say you don't
believe in whipping babies or buying a rod to beat your child and that you
don't want associated with them. It's just NOT.

glena

No, it is not wrong to say you don't believe in it. I never said it was wrong
but why don't you try arguing that thought with people that do believe in it
rather than waste the time here? Or is it that you like repeating yourself
over and over and over? Please don't even go there!
~Kim
